attributes.action: instruct the police to investigate MP's expences claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government are glossing over the recent MP's expences claims.

If the average man in the street had made such claims they would have legal proceedings brought against them, this should be the same for the MP's. 

Legal proceedings might help to restore some public faith in our corrupt political system.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
